tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE telecardiology_outcomes (
    patient_id INT,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(50),
    treatment_protocol VARCHAR(100),
    outcome VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  heart_condition VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
  treatment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  treatment_type VARCHAR(50),
  treatment_date DATE,
  outcome VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Patient_Records (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name TEXT,
  age INT,
  gender TEXT,
  diagnosis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ECG_Results (
  ecg_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  ecg_date DATE,
  ecg_data JSON,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient_Records(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Treatment_Plans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_description TEXT,
  physician_name TEXT,
  PRIMARY KEY(patient_id, plan_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient_Records(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  heart_condition VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_name VARCHAR(255),
  doctor_name VARCHAR(100),
  treatment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR,
  diagnosis VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  appointment_date DATE,
  patient_id INT,
  doctor_id INT,
  outcome VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_type VARCHAR,
  treatment_date DATE
);
